name: ClickBit
description: ClickBit - clicker game performed in IT style, the main target of which is the gradual development. Also, the game has an upgrades that will help you speed up the gameplay.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Windows Vista / Windows 7 / Windows 8.1 / Windows 10 Processor: 1.4 Ghz or better Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: at least 256 MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 66 MB available space
